channel.title: Cannabis is not harmfull to human body and mind?
channel.description:
http://www.shoutwire.com/viewstory/72739/The_Marijuana_Conspiracy_The_Real_Reason_Hemp_is_Illegal
What do you think? Should it be legal or remain illegal?

item.title: Cannabis is not harmfull to human body and mind?
item.dc:creator: @Tribal Tribal
item.description:
@Tribal wrote:

Gotta Catch Them All:

Smoking is bad for your lungs, so yes it does harm your body.

Who said anything about smoking?You can eat it aswell.
I was not talking about a joint or something i was just talking about Cannabis itself

Read full topic
item.source: Cannabis is not harmfull to human body and mind?

item.source: Cannabis is not harmfull to human body and mind?

item.title: Cannabis is not harmfull to human body and mind?
item.dc:creator: @Tribal Tribal
item.description:
@Tribal wrote:

[quote=“The Un-Named, post:12, topic:108073”][quote author=Mopman link=topic=154672.msg1456568#msg1456568 date=1181419200]

My friends puff canabis ALOT… Their brains are fucked up and can barely talk (unless they are stoned). I only smoke it a couple of times a week, though I smoke tobacco alot also. Cannibis does have long/short term side effects - no matter what you say.!

It might differ from person to person. From my experience, if a person smokes daily for long enough (a good few months) you will notice that they’re not quite the same as everyone else However, it goes away once they stop smoking for a bit, it’s not like it’s permanent brain damage or anything.

Err – not for me.

[/quote]

I said that earlier Anyway, doing any drug daily is a stupid thing to do, I would say it’s abuse but I’m not actually sure what drug abuse means. :p[/quote]
Sometimes i do it daily but then i dont smoke a whole joint, just a lil bit so i guess thats not so bad

Last time i smoked i started seeing weird things like people were making weird faces and the noises were different but i’ve read somewhere that smoking cannabis doesnt make you hallucinate , so can anyone explain?

Read full topic
item.source: Cannabis is not harmfull to human body and mind?

My friends puff canabis ALOT… Their brains are fucked up and can barely talk (unless they are stoned). I only smoke it a couple of times a week, though I smoke tobacco alot also. Cannibis does have long/short term side effects - no matter what you say.!

It might differ from person to person. From my experience, if a person smokes daily for long enough (a good few months) you will notice that they’re not quite the same as everyone else However, it goes away once they stop smoking for a bit, it’s not like it’s permanent brain damage or anything.

Err – not for me.
[/quote][/quote]

I said that earlier Anyway, doing any drug daily is a stupid thing to do, I would say it’s abuse but I’m not actually sure what drug abuse means.

[/quote]

It might differ from person to person. From my experience, if a person smokes daily for long enough (a good few months) you will notice that they’re not quite the same as everyone else However, it goes away once they stop smoking for a bit, it’s not like it’s permanent brain damage or anything.

item.source: Cannabis is not harmfull to human body and mind?

item.title: Cannabis is not harmfull to human body and mind?
item.dc:creator: @Tribal Tribal
item.description:
@Tribal wrote:

[quote=“The Un-Named, post:7, topic:108073”][quote author=Tribal link=topic=154672.msg1455888#msg1455888 date=1181406764]

No, cannabis, marijuana, pot or whatever you want to call it is NOT harmful at all. It causes NO shortterm damage, nor longterm. Smoking it, of course will do some damage but then any kind of smoking will fuck you up. It is illegal because the fuck-tard scientists in the 60’s found out, smoking is harmful! No shit!

On a side note, the average PURE cannabis joint is roughly 10-20 machine-rolled cigarettes, or 5-10 hand rolled ones. The big companies put chemicals in their cigarettes.

I’m not so sure about the shortterm damage.Last time i smoked was in school and it took me 5 fucking minutes to learn the translation of 1 word in french.(No ,this doesn’t happen when i don’t smoke)

I don’t understand what you were saying : “the average PURE cannabis joint is roughly 10-20 machine-rolled cigarettes”…
you mean the price??

No.

Company cigarettes, and hand rolled cigarettes differ, company cigarettes have special chemicals in them so they are a LOT more harmful than hand rolled.

Now, I assume you smoked tobacco, when I smoke tobacco, I cough, I choke, after 10 mins I feel dizzy, I sweat and I’ve fainted 2 times. Cannabis smoking, however is different. Everything just seems slowed down, more colourful and such. This is different for different people but tobacco and cannabis smoking are COMPLETELY different.

Again, you can cook & eat cannabis witch is completely healthy.

I was thinking it was the opposite because company cigarettes have filters on them and the hand rolled cigarettes do not.
When i smoke tobacco i feel relaxed and nothing else.

I do agree that smoking cannabis and tobacco are completely different and im sure everyone who has smoked both would think the same.
[/quote]

Actually, everyone I know uses filters in hand-rolled.[/quote]
well, i don’t…

Read full topic
item.source: Cannabis is not harmfull to human body and mind?

I’m not so sure about the shortterm damage.Last time i smoked was in school and it took me 5 fucking minutes to learn the translation of 1 word in french.(No ,this doesn’t happen when i don’t smoke)
